title: Rifampicin adsorption and release study using Santa Barbara amorphous-16 modified Al (SBA-16-Al) for a drug delivery system
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7371-7382
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08360H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Maria Christina Prihatiningsih, Chaidir Pratama, Noor Anis Kundari, Kartini Megasari, Dhita Ariyanti, Andri Saputra, Hersandy Dayu Kusuma, Puji Astuti
In this study, the surface modification of Santa Barbara Amorphous-16 (SBA-16) with aluminum (SBA-16-Al) was carried out as a rifampicin matrix for the treatment of tuberculosis.
